title: Hellboy II: the golden army.
abstract: Double Negative delivered 1,050 shots for "Hellboy II The Golden Army". Working closely with director Guillermo Del Toro, the team's work covered the gamut of VFX, including 16 CG characters (seven digi-doubles and nine full CG characters), CG environments, and CG fire, steam, smoke, water, dust, and debris.
